stories.title: Add Item to Backlog (Manual)
stories.i_want_to: add a feature idea to my backlog using natural language
stories.so_that: I can capture ideas quickly without starting a full workflow

stories.title: Add Item from External Reference
stories.i_want_to: add a Jira ticket or GitHub issue to my backlog by reference
stories.so_that: the framework tracks the source and can pull content when MCP is available

stories.title: Analyze a Backlog Item
stories.i_want_to: analyze a backlog item interactively through requirements, impact analysis, architecture, and design
stories.so_that: I have well-thought-out artifacts before I start building

stories.title: Resume Partial Analysis
stories.i_want_to: resume analysis of an item I started yesterday
stories.so_that: I don't have to redo work I've already completed

stories.title: Build a Feature
stories.i_want_to: say 'build this' to start implementing a backlog item
stories.so_that: the framework handles workflow initialization, branching, and phase progression automatically

stories.title: Natural Language Intent Detection
stories.i_want_to: use natural language like 'add this to the backlog' or 'let's build this'
stories.so_that: I never need to remember slash commands

stories.title: View Analysis Status in Backlog
stories.i_want_to: see which items are raw, partially analyzed, fully analyzed, or completed when viewing my backlog
stories.so_that: I know what's ready to build

stories.title: Fix a Bug (Unchanged)
stories.i_want_to: say 'this is broken' or 'fix this bug' to start a bug fix workflow
stories.so_that: the fix workflow remains distinct from the feature workflow
